testsuite.name: org.loginModule.FilterPageTestClass

testcase.name: VerifyFilterDropDownOption
testcase.system-out: Filterdropdown contains the correct value Filter option are display

testcase.name: VerifyApplyingAlphabeticalFilterNameAtoZ
testcase.system-out: products are sorted alphabetically(A to Z)

testcase.name: VerifyApplyingAlphabeticalFilterNameZtoA
testcase.system-out: Product are sorted alphabetically Z TO A

testcase.name: verifySortingLowtoHighPrice
testcase.system-out: Products are sorted by price (Low to High)

testcase.name: verifySortingHighToLowPrice
testcase.system-out: product are sorted by price(High to Low)

testsuite.system-out: Filterdropdown contains the correct value Filter option are display products are sorted alphabetically(A to Z) Product are sorted alphabetically Z TO A Products are sorted by price (Low to High) product are sorted by price(High to Low)
